returnType: The SYSDATE function returns a date value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL SYSDATE function returns the current system date and time on your local database.
sample:
SELECT SYSDATE
INTO v_date
FROM dual; SELECT supplier_id, SYSDATE
FROM suppliers
WHERE supplier_id > 5000; SELECT supplier_id, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
FROM suppliers
WHERE supplier_id > 5000;
